text.text: We are looking for an exploration geologist to help assist our exploration team

The candidate will be primarily working out of Cobalt, ON, and working on a rotation schedule which is typically comprised of 15 days on, and 13 off. The schedule is flexible depending on the work requirements and location of each project. Room and board will be included if the candidate is not local or if the tasks assigned requires an overnight away from the provided housing.
Primary duties will be related to drilling, core logging, and field work. The position may require occasional work outside the regular workday and a flexible schedule.
